io.janusproject.services.distributeddata

Interface DMultiMap<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K -
    V -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Multimap<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDMultiMapView, DMultiMapView, HazelcastDMultiMapView

    public interface DMultiMap<K,V>
extends Multimap<K,V>
    Interface that represents a distributed multi-map.

    A multi-map is a map that is associating a key to multiple values.

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

      Methods

      Add listener on events on the DMultiMap.
      String getName()
      Replies the name of the multimap.
      boolean isBackedCollection()
      Replies if changes to the returned collections will update the underlying map, and vice versa.
      void removeDMapListener(DMapListener<? super K,? super V> listener)
      Remove listener on events on the DMultiMap.
      int valueCount(K key)
      Returns number of values matching to given key in the multimap.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.google.common.collect.Multimap

        asMap, clear, containsEntry, containsKey, containsValue, entries, equals, get, hashCode, isEmpty, keys, keySet, put, putAll, putAll, remove, removeAll, replaceValues, size, values

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Replies the name of the multimap.
        Returns:
        the name of the multimap.

      • isBackedCollection

        boolean isBackedCollection()
        Replies if changes to the returned collections will update the underlying map, and vice versa. However, changes to the returned collection are not possible.
        Returns:
        true if the changes are applied to the underlying map, otherwise false.

      • valueCount

        int valueCount(K key)
        Returns number of values matching to given key in the multimap.

        Warning:

        This method uses hashCode and equals of binary form of the key, not the actual implementations of hashCode and equals defined in key's class.

        Parameters:
        key - the key whose values count are to be returned
        Returns:
        number of values matching to given key in the multimap.

      • addDMapListener

        void addDMapListener(DMapListener<? super K,? super V> listener)
        Add listener on events on the DMultiMap.
        Parameters:
        listener - - the listener

      • removeDMapListener

        void removeDMapListener(DMapListener<? super K,? super V> listener)
        Remove listener on events on the DMultiMap.
        Parameters:
        listener - - the listener
